org.helm.editor.editor

Class GUIBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.helm.editor.editor.GUIBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MacromoleculeEditor

    public abstract class GUIBase
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract base class for GUI- and Graph2DView-based demos. Provides useful callback methods.

    To avoid problems with "calls to overriden method in constructor", do not initializeIOHandler the demo within the constructor of the subclass, use the method initializeIOHandler() instead.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  GUIBase.ExitAction
      Action that terminates the application
      protected class  GUIBase.FitContent
      Action that fits the content nicely inside the view.
      protected class  GUIBase.LoadAction
      Action that loads the current graph from a file in YGF format.
      protected class  GUIBase.PrintAction
      Action that prints the contents of the view
      protected class  GUIBase.SaveAction
      Action that saves the current graph to a file in YGF format.
      protected class  GUIBase.SaveAsImage 
      protected class  GUIBase.SaveSubsetAction
      Action that saves the current subset of the graph to a file in YGF format.
      protected class  GUIBase.SequenceGraph2DClipboard
      modify the default past action
      protected class  GUIBase.Zoom
      Action that applies a specified zoom level to the view.
      class  GUIBase.ZoomArea
      Action that zooms the view to the bounding box of selected nodes.
